item.title: Calculate Anual Rate Of Return In Python
item.author: Shiva Inampudi
item.description: Hey there! We’re going to work on a challenge together where we’ll be writing a program called invest.py. The goal of this program is to track the growing amount of an investment over time. We’ll start with an initial deposit, also known as the principal amount. Each year, this amount will increase by a fixed percentage called the annual rate of return. For instance, if we start with a principal amount of $100 and an annual rate of return of 5%, the first year’s increase will be $5.
